name: AuthorizationItemSet
desc: A structure containing a set of authorization items.

items.name: init(count: UInt32, items: UnsafeMutablePointer<AuthorizationItem>?)
items.desc: Initializes an authorization item set with the given items.

items.name: var count: UInt32
items.desc: The number of elements in the items array.

items.name: var items: UnsafeMutablePointer<AuthorizationItem>?
items.desc: A pointer to an array of authorization items.
